entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Localization of "description" field of manifest file #20497
    6.0.1xx
  • (dotnet watch) - example command is invalid #20487
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 SDK seems to replicate resources from NuGet packages #20483
  • Error for duplicate file with same metadata is not robust enough #20482
  • Publishing self-contained solution yields wrong system binaries in some environments #20450
  • [6.0 RC1] F5 debugging ASP.NET Core broken in Visual Studio due to HTTP 404 #20444
  • Environment.OSVersion returns the incorrect value for macOS 12 Monterey #20440

Closed

  • Workload installer needs to be aware of x64-retargeted packs #20139
    6.0.1xx
  • [ASP.NET] Improve baseline test parameterization #18954
    6.0.1xx
  • Targeting net5 using net6 SDK causes pack failure #19665
  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 preview 7 #20008

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `dotnet watch` description #20489
    Area-CLI
  • Add platform descriminator to workload records #20484
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix cross-os symbol generation #20481
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [Razor] [Backport] Allow optionally specifying an alternative package path when packing (#20451) #20465
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

Merged

  • Fix bad merge re-apply de34d98c4f282888a257b2941c46e5baaa2cc2f9 #20468
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Doc for build deb and rpm locally #20405
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx rc1 #20415
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not clear DOTNET_MODIFIABLE_ASSEMBLIES in startup hook #20424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Allow optionally specifying an alternative package path when packing #20451
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor][Backport] Reenables the ability to set a custom application part factory for an assembly. (#20378) #20447
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow the app to rebuild when a new scoped css file is added #20417
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
